SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TMR.ROLE_ID DESC) AS RNUM, TMR.ROLE_ID, TMR.PAR_ROLE_ID, TMR.ROLE_NM, TMR.ROLE_DC, TMR.CREATE_ID, (SELECT TU.USER_NM FROM TB_META_USER TU WHERE TMR.CREATE_ID = TU.USER_SEQ ) CREATE_NM, TMR.CREATE_DATE, TMR.UPDATE_ID, (SELECT TU.USER_NM FROM TB_META_USER TU WHERE TMR.UPDATE_ID = TU.USER_SEQ ) UPDATE_NM, TMR.UPDATE_DATE FROM tb_meta_role TMR
WHERE 1=1
) T1

SELECT T1.RNUM, T1.ROLE_ID, IFNULL(CONCAT(T1.PAR_ROLE_NM, '(' , T1.PAR_ROLE_ID, ')'), '') AS PAR_ROLE_ID, T1.ROLE_NM, T1.ROLE_DC, T1.CREATE_ID, T1.CREATE_DATE, T1.UPDATE_ID, T1.UPDATE_NM, T1.UPDATE_DATE
FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TMR.ROLE_ID DESC) AS RNUM, TMR.ROLE_ID, TMR.PAR_ROLE_ID, (SELECT TMR2.ROLE_NM FROM TB_META_ROLE TMR2 WHERE TMR.PAR_ROLE_ID = TMR2.ROLE_ID ) PAR_ROLE_NM, TMR.ROLE_NM, TMR.ROLE_DC, TMR.CREATE_ID, (SELECT TU.USER_NM FROM TB_META_USER TU WHERE TMR.CREATE_ID = TU.USER_SEQ ) CREATE_NM, TMR.CREATE_DATE, TMR.UPDATE_ID, (SELECT TU.USER_NM FROM TB_META_USER TU WHERE TMR.UPDATE_ID = TU.USER_SEQ ) UPDATE_NM, TMR.UPDATE_DATE FROM TB_META_ROLE TMR
WHERE 1=1
) T1

SELECT TMMRM.ROLE_ID, TMMRM.MENU_ID, TMM.MENU_NM, TMM.MENU_NM_EN
FROM TB_META_MENU_ROLE_MAPPING TMMRM
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_META_MENU TMM ON TMMRM.MENU_ID = TMM.MENU_ID
WHERE TMMRM.ROLE_ID = #{ROLE_ID}
ORDER BY MENU_ID ASC
